name: Twixl Publisher Article
summary: Learn about .ARTICLE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: ARTICLE files are used to store individual articles that can be merged together with the Publication Composer tool in the Twixl Publisher. This file type enables you to manage separate articles instead of a book of articles and is helpful for multiple designers working on the same publication.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
